Direct message the job poster from Direct Recruiters, Inc.
Joe Gomer
Recruiter+Headhunter
Catalyst of Win-Win Situations
Stable, Growing, Unique Market Niche Manufacturer-Distributor is seeking a 'Head of All Data Governance' to Build out this new initiative.Your Chance to Build and Grow a New Team alongside all Processes, Procedures and Technologies.Managerial-Leadership Culture of using the best available technologies, hiring the best people and putting the best systems and processes in place….’We’ve reached a point in our ongoing growth trajectory where it’s time to Formalize and Success Data Governance and Master Data Management.’Desired Skills/Experience:Experience working in a Data Governance (MDM) Department Leadership role where you have ‘Built Out’ a formalized data governance initiative ‘from scratch’…including hiring a team, documenting and formalizing processes, implementing procedures for Data Quality-Mining-Access-Reporting and creating an overall roadmap and timeline for a New Corporate Data Initiative ‘where none has existed before.’Ability to give real-world examples if your experience Leading and Executing a new formalized Data Governance/MDM Initiative within a Manufacturing and/or distribution environment.Experience working as the ‘ongoing’ key-communicator with ALL departments including Supply Chain, Pricing, Operations, Sales, Manufacturing, HR, Accounting surrounding MDM and Data Governance.Experience working in a similar role for a Manufacturing and/or Distribution type company with mixture Complex Supply-Chain Data And Complex SKU’s is preferred.Should Be well versed in all of these:
Data Assessments (uses cases, data catalogs, etc.) and
Data Audits (with a focus on data metrics, data quality, data consistency, latency, etc.) and Strategy (high level strategy that will be broken down into smaller components) and
Gap Analysis (what’s missing within the to-be-data-governance stack and related processes alongside recommendations, suggestions, ideas for ‘closing gaps)Experience using and working with disparate Data coming from multiple sources including ERP, MRP, CRM, PIM (product info. management) Accounting, Sales and other systems with a keen eye for patterns, consistencies, relationships, correlations within ‘all’ data.Experience working in a similar role where you are looked upon as the problem solver or fixer within Data Governance and MDM.A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Data, Statistics, Mathematics, Information Systems or a similar field is strongly preferred; a Master’s Degree is a plus.Pluses:Experience with STIBOExperience sourcing, reviewing and properly vetting external vendors.Experience working in a similar role in an M&A type environment.Very Competitive Salary and Great Benefits.Call or Apply Today!
